description.value:
Frequency once per hour

You reach into another creature's timeline and attempt to alter their flow of time. Select a creature within 30 feet. That creature attempts a @Check[type:fortitude|dc:resolve(@actor.system.attributes.classOrSpellDC.value)] saving throw against your chronoskimmer DC. The creature takes the effects of @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Slow] based on the result of its saving throw.
